漢羅台文: 佇彼時目睭已經強強欲失明--去的陳達老先生，
台羅: tī hit-sî ba̍k-tsiu í-king kiōng-kiōng-beh sit-bîng--khì ê Tân Ta̍t lāu-sian-sinn,
台羅數字調: ti7 hit4-si5 bak8-tsiu1 i2-king1 kiong7-kiong7-beh4 sit4-bing5--khi3 e5 tan5 tat8 lau7-sian1-sinn1,
白話字: tī hit-sî ba̍k-chiu í-keng kiōng-kiōng-beh sit-bêng--khì ê Tân Ta̍t lāu-sian-siⁿ,
